channel.title: Fixed
channel.description:
Please don't flame for this... Okay, so what i want to do when i leave school is digital web design or digital media engineering. but I dont understand this... i built the page but when i try go onto it it shows an error regarding this code
while ($myrow = [code]mysql_fetch_array[/code]($result)) { $uptime_calc = $myrow['checks'] - $myrow['down']; $uptime = round( ($uptime_calc/$myrow['checks'])*100, 0 );
the error is the quoted code but i dont know what is wrong with it .. can anyone point me in the right direction? Edit: the error is:
Warning: mysql_fetch_array(): supplied argument is not a valid MySQL result resource in /public_html/toplist.php on line 96

item.title: Fixed
item.dc:creator: @nsfpure nsfpure
item.description:
@nsfpure wrote:

[quote=“meiscooldude, post:2, topic:407852”][quote]mysql_fetch_array[/quote]?

make that mysql_fetch_array[/quote]

the quotes aren’t actually there. i tried to add them in in this post

Edit: fixed the origional post

Read full topic
